alternatives.name: Navidrome
alternatives.description: Self-hosted music server compatible with Subsonic/Airsonic clients. Stream your own music collection from anywhere.

alternatives.name: Funkwhale
alternatives.description: Federated music listening and sharing platform. Part of the Fediverse.

alternatives.name: Nuclear
alternatives.description: Desktop music player that streams from free sources like YouTube, SoundCloud, and Bandcamp.

alternatives.name: Signal
alternatives.description: End-to-end encrypted messaging. Widely regarded as the gold standard for private communication.

alternatives.name: Signal
alternatives.description: End-to-end encrypted messaging. Widely regarded as the gold standard for private communication.

alternatives.name: Firefox
alternatives.description: Independent browser from Mozilla. Strong privacy features, extensive add-on ecosystem.

alternatives.name: LibreWolf
alternatives.description: Firefox fork focused on privacy, security, and freedom. Telemetry and DRM removed by default.

alternatives.name: OpenStreetMap
alternatives.description: Community-built map of the world. Free to use and edit. Powers many other open source map tools.

alternatives.name: Nextcloud
alternatives.description: Self-hosted productivity platform with file sync, calendar, contacts, office suite, and more.

alternatives.name: Syncthing
alternatives.description: Continuous peer-to-peer file synchronization. No cloud, no accounts, no limits.

alternatives.name: PeerTube
alternatives.description: Federated video hosting platform. Instances can interconnect. Uses peer-to-peer streaming to reduce server load.

alternatives.name: LibreOffice
alternatives.description: Full-featured office suite. Writer, Calc, Impress, Draw, Base, and Math. Reads and writes MS Office formats.

alternatives.name: CryptPad
alternatives.description: End-to-end encrypted collaborative office suite. Documents, spreadsheets, presentations, and more.

alternatives.name: Mattermost
alternatives.description: Self-hosted team messaging with channels, threads, integrations, and playbooks.

alternatives.name: GIMP
alternatives.description: Powerful image editor with advanced tools for photo retouching, composition, and image authoring.
